Package net.silthus.schat.command

package net.silthus.schat.command
Contains the API for creating Commands.
  • Class
    Description
    Command
    Represents an operation that can be executed independently and yields a Result.
    Command.Builder<B extends Command.Builder<B,C>,C extends Command>
    A generic builder used to construct commands.
    Command.Error
    A generic error that can be thrown by commands.
    CommandBuilder<B extends Command.Builder<B,C>,C extends Command>
    An abstract base class of the Command.Builder.
    Result
    Represents a generic result, which can either be successful or fail.
    Result.Error
    Encapsulates an exception thrown during the execution of a Command.
